fields.name: Water conservation
fields.description: Focusing on conserving water and water supplies.

fields.name: Advocacy
fields.description: Encouraging regional and state agencies to have adaptation strategies.

fields.name: Planning
fields.description: Incoporating climate science, impacts, and assessments into government and institutional planning practices.

fields.name: Conservation
fields.description: Preserving biodiversity and protecting open spaces.

fields.name: Physical infrastructure
fields.description: Managing systems and facilities that house and transport people and goods and provide services (e.g, transportation, energy, water)

fields.name: Policies
fields.description: Introducing/revising policies to address climate change.

fields.name: Land use
fields.description: Managing and/or modifying the natural environment for built environments.

fields.name: Capacity building
fields.description: Developing the capability of human resources, institutions, and communities to adapt.

fields.name: Green infrastructure
fields.description: Managing water resources in a manner that protects, restores, or mimics the natural water cycle (e.g., planting trees and restoring wetlands).

fields.name: Research & monitoring
fields.description: Focusing on gathering and synthesizing information and/or long-term observation or measurement.

fields.name: Funding
fields.description: Finding funding for strategy implementation or offering funding programs for others' implementation efforts.

fields.name: Building codes & engineering
fields.description: Improving physical infrastructure's adaptive capacity through standards or engineering.

fields.name: Practice & behavior
fields.description: Revising and/or expanding on-the-ground behavior that affects resilience.

fields.name: Zoning
fields.description: Limiting what developers and landowners can do with their properties, ideally advancing public health, safety, and welfare.

fields.name: Energy
fields.description: Focusing on sustainable energy production and consumption strategies.

fields.name: Education
fields.description: Increasing public knowledge regarding climate change impacts and adaptation strategies.
